days.text: Slight flooding may occur in Inner Harbour area from 10 pm ~ 1 am due to astronomical tide. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
